said. announcement whether any disagreements internally prompted the change, but Eric Schmidt says Larry Page is ready to run the company, while Sergey Brin will continue focusing on new product ideas, with the title of Co-Founder. Larry Page , in my clear opinion, is ready to lead, Eric Schmidt said in the blog post. In the nearly ten years as the CEO, Eric Schmidt has helped lead Google from an innovative search company in search of a real business model into a tech giant with

the company needed a more mature leader. Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Larry Page and Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , as Google's executive chairman. The changes will be effective April 4. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, Eric Schmidt said. Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt , too.`` There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly,'' Larry Page said.
